text: ql -ayha alrswl-: aakhbrkm bikhayr mimaa zuyin llnnas fi hadhih alhayat aldnya, liman raqb allah wakhaf eqabh janaat tajri min taht qswrha washjarha alanhar, khalidin fyha, walahum fiha 'azwaj mthrat min alhayd walnfas wsw' alkhlq, walahum 'aezam min dhlk: ridwan min allh. wallah mttalie ealaa srayr khlqh, ealam bahwalhm, wsyjazyhm ealaa dhlk
